info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 31 at 4:19PM PDT until July 31 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR ESMERALDA AND NORTHWESTERN NYE COUNTIES... At 419 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Lida, Tonopah Test Range, Coaldale, Dyer, Beatty, Goldfield, Lida Junction, Gold Point, Scottys Junction, Silver Peak and Fish Lake Valley Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
